Based on your preferences, I would highly recommend watching 'Aladdin'. It's an iconic Disney movie that has captured the hearts of people all over the world for many years now.

The movie tells the story of Aladdin, a young man living in the desert with his father and uncle. Despite their hard work and dedication, they live a very poor and difficult life in the desert.

One day, while wandering through the desert, Aladdin stumbles upon a magical lamp. Excited by this discovery, Aladdin decides to retrieve the lamp from the place where it was found.

However, before he can do that, Aladdin is suddenly confronted by a powerful sorcerer named Jafar. Terrified by this unexpected encounter with a powerful sorcerer, Aladdin tries to flee from him as quickly as possible.

Unfortunately for Aladdin, Jafar is not only incredibly fast and agile, but also has the ability to control his anger and emotions, which allows him to remain calm and collected even in extremely stressful and challenging situations like those that he finds himself suddenly confronted by on this day while wandering through the desert.
